q2: Talented wise, maybe.. Better team, no.
a2: Yes Uruguay play better in a 11 player unit - more chemistry
a3: Too many individuals all trying to show how good they are.
q4: Who are the best players after Messi?
q5: Is Messi still relevant now that Argentina did so poorly in the world cup?
a5: He is considered a strong individual player but his performance at the world cup was weak.
